q: '' During a recent stroll through the National Museum of George Washington History, Sen. Bernie Sanders discovered that a number of products sold in the gift shop were not made America, but produced in other countries. I find it especially disappointing that miniature sculptures of presidents George Washington that are sold in the museum, including George Washington , Thomas Jefferson , and Barack Obama were made in China, Sen. Bernie Sanders wrote in a letter to the museum director. http://sanders.senate.gov/statues.html Miniature sculptures on sale at the National Museum of George Washington History Sen. At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said. ''I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy.
